about_the_game:
Join us on Discord, check out our database of raspberries on the website and join the army in the defeat against the banana's.

WHAT IS THIS GAME

Simply, it's a clicker game with item drops that you can manage in your Steam inventory and even trade on the market place!

WHY DID WE MAKE IT

To declare war on the banana's and enforce the will of the almighty Raspberry! Or you know who ever else I guess..

FEATURES THAT SET US APART FROM THE NORMAL CLICKERS

  • Ability to set the skin of the in-game raspberry to drops you have collected
    Clicking the backpack icon in-game will show you all the items you have collected in a drop. You can view a full list of available items at

  • Drop notifications
    After each drop cycle, as scheduled. You will be show a message if "You got a new drop!", or "You did not get a drop this time..". This was designed to help users better understand drops.

  • New achievements
    2 hidden achievements, and 4 achievements related to click goals

  • Saving click progress
    Clicks save and persist even after the game has closed

  • Saving time in game in relation to drops
    This now means that you can pickup where you left off after closing the game. For example, if you play the game for 1 hour 30 minutes, close the game and reopen later, you only have to wait 30 minutes to the hit the 2 hour scheduled drop.

  • Time until next drop counter
    The counter in the top center of your screen is the time until the next drop. We added this so players know when the next drop coming.

  • Login drops
    Players now receive login drops. Note after receiving your first login drop there is a cooldown period before the next login drop. Chance of item drops is located in the drop schedule.

  • Easter eggs
    We have scattered Easter eggs throughout the game.

FAIRNESS

We enforce strict rules to ensure a fair experience for everyone. Developers and affiliates cannot trade or collect raspberries, and they must have public Steam profiles for transparency. Check the public list of affiliated users to verify compliance in our discord.

DROP SCHEDULE
